title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB
details: A comprehensive e-commerce solution featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and payment integration. Built with modern web technologies and following best practices for scalability and performance.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates
details: A real-time collaborative task management application that allows teams to organize projects, assign tasks, and track progress. Features include drag-and-drop kanban boards, real-time notifications, and team collaboration tools.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A responsive weather dashboard with data visualization
details: An interactive weather dashboard that displays current conditions, forecasts, and historical weather data with beautiful charts and visualizations. Features location-based weather, multiple city tracking, and responsive design.
